content.label: This game sucks🤬

I have only been playing for maybe like 3 weeks and I have 3 UNREAL clones only one problem if the player your battling shoots a mind tick at your flying barrel when it explodes only one of the bomb birds should be Mind controlled it’s not like they shot  8 ticks at it so please fix that
Smh

You ruined the game with these stupid runes!!! I spent over 1000$ on your game and supported you for over a year!!! Why couldn’t you have just made BadLand Brawl 2 or BadLand Brawl runes as a completely different app!?!? Now I don’t even want to play bc the game is horrible and not fun anymore. I’m not the only one who feels this way either. Most of the BadLand community feels this way. All the OG players.
After I make an in game purchase I don’t always get the purchase right after it takes my money.
I am currently quarantined due to covid and needed something to kill the time, and honestly i think i found my next favorate game. It’s very addicting

The game is great overall but you can tell that there are hacks, two enemies on two different teams yet they summon a gigantic enemy in first 3 seconds. Do your reviews on people playing on two phones at once to get an unfair advantage.

This game is great I love it but my only problem is the money. You make so little money every match and from eggs that it takes forever to upgrade your cards...it took me about a few hours just to make 1000 coins which seems very tedious. I think you guys either need to lower the cost of upgrades or increase the amount we get from eggs or matches.

I hardly ever write reviews, but this game well deserves one! The mechanics, physics, and gameplay is masterful and perfect. Matchmaking is accurate and very well balanced. It is all around fun and carefully crafted. It’s definitely worth a try! It kicks Clash Royale in the butt. It’s slow to start but gets really in depth the longer you play. Trust me, try it!!!
Maybe it’s just me but I lose a lot simply Because I’m put up against 3-5 lvls higher player. I’m a lvl 9 I should go against lvl 15-19   This is a good game though
Just switched from a Samsung phone to an apple and I lost all process. Zero help from customer service. Won’t even respond. Can’t tell you how much time and money are wasted

title.label: Used to be the best game, now boring

content.label:
The clones which require the least amount of skill are overpowered. The defensive runes have ruined the game. There’s no longer skill or intelligence required - just load your team up with the biggest clones and watch your opponent fruitlessly try and stop them while doing little damage if they manage to score with a skill based team. Really disappointing.

Edit: next patch, they have fixed the defensive rune issue, but now they’ve added an invulnerability to tower rune. Broken game which is no contest when the invulnerability rune is involved.
Hd

title.label: One overpowered clone can ruin a good time

content.label:
THE MIND TICK MUST BE NERFED!
It is way to game changing for its low mana cost. If you want to keep it in the game it’s cost should be 6 or 8. It is incredibly unfair and gives people an “I win” button.

The only reason I give a worse review is because the game is good but their is no player or bug reporting system (which is bad because I’ve lost 4 games in a row because they either throw or go afk, one of which was a player named malyar who has 13,000 wins) but other than that there is a bug where the core lightning sometimes doesn’t summon giganticore even with the other two in position an inch away from it

title.label: its great! but it does need one fix

content.label: this one fix is the trophies all i ask is that could you please disable the risk of losing trophies and getting knocked out of your land?, anyways i recommend the game so DOWNLOAD IT

title.label: This game seems fun until you realize

content.label: I’ve never played this game and left in a better mood than when I started in fact once you pay attention you realize that if you play this game it will put you in a worse mood than when you started.  It’s entertaining but only because it’s addictive and it does nothing to make you or your life better or even make you feel better it will do the opposite though.

Fun at first. Like most free games in the App Store you can only enjoy for a short amount of time before you are held back by the game (I’m guessing to get you to spend real money for upgrades)...reached level 13 and ever since I’m matched against 15-20 leveled players 7 out of 10 matches.

title.label: Wont give me my money back

content.label: I made a purchase accidentally and now I can’t get my money back because it would “not be fair to other players’ progress”. How does that make sense? I will delete the game if I get my money back so it’s not unfair to other players... this is absurd.
Copy of clash of clans but that’s what you say this is so much different it is 2 d and that’s it lol

I’ve been in an abusive relationship with this game for the past couple years. It’s addicting and fun at first. You spend hundreds and hundred of hours getting good at it. Then the moment you establish a good strategy and rack up a gang of points advancing to the level you’ve spent months striving to achieve, the devs update the algorithm and set you back 1,000+ points. If the seasonal updates don’t completely waste your time, dong worry. The moment you get momentum and start advancing levels, the algorithm puts you up against a string of players at least 3-5 levels higher than you making it mathematically impossible to win. You lose 600 points, go on a run, rinse and repeat. But wait! There’s more! It used to be a relatively smooth game with the occasional glitch. They were so rare you put up with it because like George Costanza, you’re addicted! However, the glitching and constant movement of goal posts has gotten so bad throughout 2020 that I deleted it completely for a couple weeks and started back on Sims. Needed something to do while waiting for things over there, so I downloaded again this morning. The first game was super smooth and I figured they fixed everything while I was gone. Maybe things had changed? No. The second game I glitched every two seconds the entire 2:50 of the match with attacks constantly bouncing back into place. The third game glitched sporadically. The fourth game went back to every 2 second glitching. I left the brawl, deleted the app, and came here to write my first game review. A potentially great game ruined by greedy and inept developers. The errors and rule changes they constantly push into production are truly breathtaking. So long, boys. Hope you get this sorted, but you have wasted enough of my time for a lifetime.

title.label: Good game in the beginning but,...

content.label: I installed this game and almost immediately played, it was really awesome and great until I got to frozen noon, I had some pretty good cards but that didn’t seem to matter very much. Because when I faced people who were eather stuck trying to get to the elites at this spot or the paid money for it, but just now I hit 7 loses in a row because I didn’t spend a dime, people who win every time are most likely have spent money on this game. If anyone reads this just know and if your looking for a game that’s really fast paced and rewarding without you willing to pay money,.....,I’m sorry but I sujest looking for something else. Now let me go waist my time trying to beat this stage

Matchmaking is way off.
Clones are not balanced. 
Don’t spend money because it doesn’t get you anywhere. I spent close to 300 dollars and it gets you nowhere.

The idea and implementation is great but it asks your money on each step! You need millions of clones to reach the complete state of the clones! But without A LOT OF bucks you can't advance! I thought spending $70 is enough but no... That was actually the beginning... I deleted this game. I advise you to do so, because it's addicting! It's better to buy nice PS4 game for that money and play unlimited times without restrictions and ADS!

Since I’ve had this this game it’s been absolutely amazing! But this past week it’s been terrible!! Every other game it’s just LAGGING LAGGING LAGGING! Played it on multiple Wi-Fi connections to see if it wasn’t just mine and it still lags.

Badland brawl when you first start out is great. You play people your level , it’s competitive and fun. After a certain level you start playing people that have put tons of money into the game, max out their clones and attach runes that it becomes impossible to beat them. The new update has bugs. My game freezes up and when it finally brings me back I’ve lost two towers. The delay in which the clones come out can be detrimental. My game crashes at times, loses connection, or freezes and I come back and I’ve lost two towers. When you first start playing the game is great. Unless you buy the battle pass and even after put more money into the game, it won’t be fun.

Love, love, love all of the BADLAND games!  Unfortunately ever since I downloaded the update for brawl it stalls in the middle of a brawl.  I have to close out and reopen the game losing vital seconds of a match. Bummer

title.label: Purchased Brawl pass the could not access it

content.label: We play this game a lot and have purchased the Brawl Pass twice and twice my son has not been able to access it. I tried contacting the company with no response. We will be deleting this game and any other game by this company unless this issue is rectified soon!!!!’
You must be retarded
How do u get the bomb frog I already passed the stage

Check out my YouTube Channel ReapNation 
Smack the subscribe button

I recently purchased the battle pass, but after the update my rewards are gone. 
Please give them back

title.label: Great game - until you get good

content.label: Once you pass a certain threshold, the game is impossible to win.  Don’t buy anything, as it will level you up faster and you will face opponents that you cannot beat because they have more money.  NO FUN ANYMORE.  DELETING NOW.
Get this game there is no reason not to this game is the best badland game EVER!!!
Best Game

This is the best game in the entire universe! The runes that you at the session portal is sooooo helpful!!!!!! I told my friends and cousins to download this game and they like it to! After you get flying barrel ,Big bouncy bomb, Core-tri bomb and OVERSEER you literary just broke to game! And brawl pass is sooooo helpful you can get eggs gold skins emotes! I got a gear egg and got a LUMBERJACKIE I have been wanting for EVER , and after you finish the brawl pass you get a UNREAL EGG. You can join or make your own tribes! In the events you can win the event and get eggs AND clones you want!!!! I won a event and got a BLAST FISH!!!! When I opened to tribe egg I Got a FLYING BARREL and after it level 2 it did 1000 and something damage to the opponent’s tower!!! I’m my opinion FIREBALL is sooo good if you use spiky to kill the barrel the bomb birds will come the use the fireball To kill ALL of the bomb birds!!! Thank you For this GREAT game!!!!!!!🥳🥳🥳٩(˃̶͈̀௰˂̶͈́)و!!!!!!!!!!
This game used to be fun and required skill up until these awful updates that introduced runes,core lightning and overseer... thanks for ruining a great game that I used to enjoy.
Game has become very stale. Developers have failed to keep content fresh and up to date. Recent addition of runes to game has made it 100% pay to play. Avoid and find other games.
I thought it was a good game at first but now it is very hard and annoying

Add a team vs feature where the clan has to get points against an opposing team to get the team victory. Example: 10 v 10 except everyone gets to attack who they choose or the badlands server can pick at random once you click to enter into the team brawl. Points can be earned and you have a day to attack the total of three people and the team with the most points wins.

...and uninstall it right after. Its a fun game till you reach 5K trophies after that you will get opponents with a level much higher than you bringing clones on max levels. No chance to win. 
Overall, enjoy your first season as all the other ones will be nothing else but struggle.

Love the game, but this new clone is way too over powered and hard to stop. The bombs just keeps coming back over and over it’s so frustrating. Plus the anti-gravity and tornado don’t even stop it which doesn’t seem fair at all. I can’t get a fireball hit on it because of how many bombs are in the way. I can stop the assault the first or second time but all they have to do is throw random bombs and the clone again and it almost always ends with the bombs moving way too fast into my tower again.
So don’t need any brawl experience, just have an Overseer and you are guaranteed to win whoever does not have it. This game has gone downhill. 👎

I used to have a ton of fun however recently they have added broken character one after another that are the highest rarity in an attempt to force people to buy the brawl pass to acquire higher tier eggs to get the characters.

The game itself is fun and very innovative. However you run into the same old problems with matchups, namely, they are very inconsistent and often very unfair. You come across clones that you cannot counter if you haven’t found certain other clones in addition to matchups who are ridiculously higher than you and destroy you with ease. I moved up pretty quickly but deleted it to avoid the inevitable frustration.
I’ve played since the game came out, and it used to be good. Now the ONLY way to progress is to spend tons of money.

I’ve been playing this game for a year! I’ve sunk so many resources to get good$$$$. Spent many hours and months trying to get good at all bombs deck. I did, broke top 100 in the world at low level against max level dumb rich players, but over night all bombs nerfed 20-25%!! Now how do I spend money if u do us like that!! Disappointed
Fun at first but in late game becomes very unbalanced and is very much pay to win with the addition of the overseer.

Listen this is the best mobile game I’ve ever played, I’m such a busy human being but I still find time throughout the day to hop on this game. 
I just really need to complain regarding the balancing of this game because that’s what makes it breaks it for me. 
Core Lightning, completely overpowered. 
Legitimately takes out everything at once. I’ve played against it so many times and still won, so I’m not even mad. I really don’t like the card in the game I think it ruins gameplay. Playing against it just makes me bored of the game. 
I also just played against the Overseer and so far do not see the balance in that card whatsoever. All I ask is that you guys keep an eye out for balancing in this game. If anything, make the core lightning 5+ mana because it’s ludicrously cheap to play.

This game is insanely fun and honestly better than the other games styled like this, ie clash royale.. And I will continue to play it for years to come if it stays on the app store, but I couldn’t find anywhere to make a suggestion so I’m doing it here, Please add a thing for tribes so that the Leader and co’s can see when someone was last on, please this would make it a lot easier to run a tribe. Please I’d love to see this added and it’d be a great addition to the game.
